papers.title: AgentLeak: A Full-Stack Benchmark for Privacy Leakage in Multi-Agent LLM Systems
papers.summary_preview: Multi-agent Large Language Model (LLM) systems create privacy risks that current benchmarks cannot measure. interpretation: This artifact turns ad-hoc paper drops into lane-ready swarm work: papers are grouped by theme with a fixed task template for parallel distill-and-merge.
